---
id: update-memory-settings
title: "Update memory settings"
description: "This route allows organization administrators to update memory settings for their organization. When memory is disabled, the AI stops learning new preferences but existing memories are retained."
sidebar_label: "Update memory settings"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: api-reference/port-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update memory settings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/memory/settings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows organization administrators to update memory settings for their organization. When memory is disabled, the AI stops learning new preferences but existing memories are retained.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"memoryEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether memory should be enabled for the organization"}},"required":["memoryEnabled"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully updated memory settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ok":{"const":true},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"memoryEnabled":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"required":["ok","settings"]}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"const":false},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}},"403":{"description":"Forbidden - Admin permissions required","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"const":false},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
